publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2150 Tommy Sheridan: Tampa Refugees—That the Parliament condemns the actions of the Australian Government in refusing to allow the asylum seekers on board the boat Tampa off Christmas Island to land in Australia; believes that this behaviour contravenes all standards of humanity, and calls upon the Australian Government to reverse this inhumane policy.
S1M-2150 Tampa Refugees (lodged on 31 August 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2150 Tampa Refugees (lodged on 31 August 2001) Linda Fabiani*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-2150 Tommy Sheridan: Tampa Refugees-That the Parliament condemns the actions of the Australian Government in refusing to allow the asylum seekers on board the boat Tampa off Christmas Islands to land in Australia; believes that this behaviour contravenes all standards of humanity, and calls upon the Australian Government to reverse this inhumane policy. Supported by: Shona Robison, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White
S1M-2150 Tampa Refugees (lodged on 31 August 2001) Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*
S1M-2150 Tampa Refugees (lodged on 31 August 2001) Michael Russell*

S1M-2150 Tommy Sheridan: Tampa Refugees—That the Parliament condemns the actions of the Australian Government in refusing to allow the asylum seekers on board the boat Tampa off Christmas Islands to land in Australia; believes that this behaviour contravenes all standards of humanity, and calls upon the Australian Government to reverse this inhumane policy. Supported by: Shona Robison, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Michael Russell
S1M-2150 Tampa Refugees (lodged on 31 August 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-2150 Tommy Sheridan: Tampa Refugees-That the Parliament condemns the actions of the Australian Government in refusing to allow the asylum seekers on board the boat Tampa off Christmas Islands to land in Australia; believes that this behaviour contravenes all standards of humanity, and calls upon the Australian Government to reverse this inhumane policy. Supported by: Shona Robison, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Michael Russell, Dorothy-Grace Elder
S1M-2150 Tampa Refugees (lodged on 31 August 2001) Roseanna Cunningham*

S1M-2150 Tommy Sheridan: Tampa Refugees-That the Parliament condemns the actions of the Australian Government in refusing to allow the asylum seekers on board the boat Tampa off Christmas Islands to land in Australia; believes that this behaviour contravenes all standards of humanity, and calls upon the Australian Government to reverse this inhumane policy. Supported by: Shona Robison, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Michael Russell, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Roseanna Cunningham
